column4:
['Mere bhole balam mere', '
Pyaare balam mera', '
Jivan tere bina o mere', '
Piya hai woh diya', '
Jisame tel naa ho ke', '
Jisame tel naa ho', '
Mera jivan tere bina', '
Woh ek baag hai bahaar', '
Jisase hatkar gujare', '
Dur dur se gujare', 'O mujhe apna bana le', '
O bhole apna bana le', '
Haay re bhole apna bana le haay', '
Tere kadamo me mera pyaar', '
Mera sansaar meri kismat hai', 'Mujhe apna bana le', '
Tere kadamo me mera pyaar', '
Mera sansaar meri kismat hai', '
Mujhe apna bana le', 'Achchha guru jab woh', '
Aisa kahegi naa toh', '
Mai kya jawaab dunga', 'Jawab jawab ha ha ha ha are bamru', '
Pyaar me pyaar me jawaab apne', '
Aap ho jaata hai kahana anuradhaa', '
Arre guru guru anuradha', '
Nahi bindu bindu', '
Arre tere ki bhula', '
Kahana kahana kya', '
Meri pyaari bindu', '
Meri bholi bindu', 'Meri maatheri bindu meri', '
Sinduri bindu meri binduri bindu', '
Meri prem ki naiya bich bhanvar', '
Me gud gud gote khaaye', 'Jhatpat paar laga de', '
Jhatpat paar laga de', '
Teri bainyaan gale me daal', '
Ban jaa mere gale kaa haar', '
Jhule prem hindole o', '
Jhule prem hindole', '
Mere jivan ki aasha padh le', '
Mere naino ki bhaasha', 'Mujhe mann me basa le', '
Pal pal palako me chhupa le', '
Too jhatpat aakar chhatpat', '
Mere andhe kuye me dip jalaake', '
Kar de ujaala o jara kar de ujaala', '
Bindu re e e e bindu re e e e', '
Bindu re e e e.']
